content.html: The most important lesson I've learned in the last year: Burnout isn't just the result of too much work. It's the TYPE of work. And, more specifically, your emotional connection to it. Burnout comes from feeling like no matter how much you do, it will never be enough.
content.value:
The most important lesson I've learned in the last year:

Burnout isn't just the result of too much work. It's the TYPE of work. And, more specifically, your emotional connection to it.

Burnout comes from feeling like no matter how much you do, it will never be enough.
